template.name: Random for Specified Mixed Tags
template.description: Random tracks for specified tags from the Mixed Tag scanning module in Custom Scan with values from specified selection.

parameter.name: Do not repeat tracks within same playlist
Mixed tag 1 type
parameter.data: lt=Less than=lt,le=Less or equal to=le,ge=Greater or equal to=ge,gt=Greater than=gt,eq=Equal to=eq,contains=Contains=contains

parameter.name: Mixed tag 2 type
parameter.data: lt=Less than=lt,le=Less or equal to=le,ge=Greater or equal to=ge,gt=Greater than=gt,eq=Equal to=eq,contains=Contains=contains
